title: ascribed here to ?1483, is undated but is frequently ascribed to 1485 (as in the STC). However, the prologue assigns the compilation of the text to 1483, 23 Edward IV (March 4, 1483-April 9, 1483, the date of Edward's death, if the regnal year is used).
